column9:
Thank you for your email. I am currently away and will return to the office on Monday January 7th 2013.

Thank you.
Nick Thompson

Thank you for youe email. Our offices woll be closed from the 23rd of December 2011 and re-opening on the 3rd January 2012. All emails will be answered on our return.\r\nThank you – The Team at overseasgits.com
